PromptDefinition.Objective: Create a hierarchical and network knowledge graph for a provided frontend project codebase (using a TypeScript/React/Redux/Saga stack) in XML format. The graph must serve as a high-level semantic map for a RAG AI agent, assisting it in navigating and understanding the code's structure, dependencies, data flows, and control flows. The graph should be optimized for GPT models, making implicit relationships (like Redux action-saga chains) explicit and traceable.

RuleSet.Section: <Rule description="The entire graph must be enclosed in a root tag." /> <Rule description="The first child must be a project-specific tag, e.g., , acting as a container for all project-level information."> It must contain global , , and for the project. It must contain all code entity definitions.

Section.name: Naming Conventions for Tags and TARGET Attributes

Rule.description: Every concept name used as an XML tag must be globally unique.
Tags should be formed from original names/paths.

Transformation.value: Tag name begins with a letter or underscore.

Transformation.description: Append a suffix to indicate entity type.

Rule.description: Use attributes to map back to original source code.

Attribute.name: TYPE
Attribute.description: Describes the entity's role or hierarchical relationship.

Element.name: HANDLED_STATE
Element.description: Describes the slice of state managed.

Element.name: WATCHES_ACTION
Element.description: The action that triggers this saga.

Element.name: OUTPUT_EFFECT
Element.description: High-level description of the primary side effect.

Element.name: USES_LIBRARY
Element.description: Lists key libraries with optional weights.

Element.name: CrossLinks
Element.Structure: Each link: <Link TARGET='Unique_Target_Tag_Name' TYPE='LINK_TYPE' RELEVANCE='1-10' DESCRIPTION='optional_desc'/>

RuleSet.Section: <Rule description="Logical connections are made via tags within ."/> <Rule description="An optional section can be added to describe high-level module interactions."/>
